about_the_game:
Join the Golden Angler Club and INSTANTLY go to the Big League with all the possible perks and privileges the gaming experience can offer! Not only do you get all the incredible Advanced & Deluxe tackle in their Golden edition, but also the most powerful state-of-the-art exclusively Golden Angler equipment, including TEN monstrously powerful Golden Angler Edition rod and reel combos, a set of prime quality Golden Angler Edition fishing apparel and the awesome cherry-on-top Golden Kayak - a durable and speedy companion for your offshore fishing adventures! Sound good? How about FULL ACCESS to ALL North American and European WATERWAYS with 30-Day Pond Passes, complemented by all corresponding Advanced Fishing Licenses! Not to mention Credits, BaitCoins, and a MONTH of Premium!

Golden Angler Pack includes:
* 100 000 CREDITS
* 100 BAITCOINS
* 30-DAY PREMIUM
* 10 Marker Buoys
* 1 Storage Box (200 Slots)
* 10 Tackle Setups
* 10 Recipe Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Magfin™ NightFeather™ Golden Edition - Length: 6' 6" (2 m); Lure Weight: 1/28–1/3 Oz. (1–9 g); Power: Ultralight; Line Weight: 3–10 Lb. (1.5–4.5 kg); Action: Fast
* UL-CHUBER™ AllRound™ Golden Edition - Length: 12' 10" (3.9 m); Casting Weight: 1 3/7 – 4 2/7 Oz. (40–120 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 3–11 Lb. (1.5–4.5 kg); Action: Moderate; Quiver Tips: 1 Oz., 2 Oz., 3 Oz.
* Garry Scott™ GoldenTroy™ - Length: 23' (7 m); Line Weight: 3–13 Lb. (1.5–6.0 kg); Action: Mod Fast
* UL-CHUBER™ Golden Alli™ - Length: 13' 10" (4.2 m); Casting Weight: 3 1/28 – 6 1/4 Oz. (85–175 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 6.5–18.5 Lb. (3–8.5 kg); Action: Fast; Quiver Tips: 3 Oz., 4 Oz., 5 Oz.
* Magfin™ LuxCaster™ Golden Edition - Length: 7' 3" (2.2 m); Lure Weight: 3/8-1 3/7 Oz. (10–40 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7.5–23 Lb. (3.5–10.5 kg); Action: Fast
* RIVERTEX™ Loki™ Golden Edition - Length: 8' 10" (2.7 m); Lure Weight: 7/8 – 2 1/2 Oz. (25–70 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7–26.5 Lb. (4–12 kg); Action: Moderate
* Garry Scott™ Brutus™ Golden Edition - Length: 10' 10" (3.3 m); Line Weight: 11–34 Lb. (5–15.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast
* UL-CHUBER™ Heavy Chaser™ Golden Edition - Length: 9' 10" (3.0 m); Casting Weight: 6 – 8 4/5 Oz. (170–250 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 22– 56.2 lb ( 10–25.5 kg); Action: Moderate
* RIVERTEX™ Golden Zeus™ - Length: 8' 2" (2.5 m); Lure Weight: 5/8 – 2 Oz. (18–56 g); Power: X-Heavy; Line Weight: 15 – 42 lb (7–19.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast
* RIVERTEX™ CosmoCast™ Golden Edition - Length: 9' 6" (2.9 m); Lure Weight: 1 1/10 – 2 5/8 Oz. (30–75 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 30.8–62.8 Lb (14–28,5 kg); Action: Mod Fast
Reels:
* Magfin™ EspiraSlim™ Golden Edition - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 3/100 (0.25/100), braid 6/125 (0.2/125); Max Drag: 8 Lb. (3.6 kg); Ball Bearings: 12+1; Weight: 7 Oz. (200 g); Drag: front
* UL-CHUBER™ FeederForcer™ Golden Edition - Ratio: 4.8:1; Recovery: 32" (81 cm); Capacity: mono 32/120 (0.5/120), braid 30/205 (0.28/205); Max Drag: 10.5 Lb. (4.75 kg); Ball Bearings: 4+1; Weight: 18.5 Oz. (524 g); Drag: front
* Magfin™ EspiraML™ Golden Edition - Ratio: 4.7:1; Recovery: 27.5" (70 cm); Capacity: mono 12/100 (0.3/100), braid 20/135 (0.23/135); Max Drag: 12.1 Lb. (5.5 kg); Ball Bearings: 7+1; Weight: 11.5 Oz.; Drag: front
* Magfin™ BigRiver™ Golden Edition - Ratio: 6.0:1; Recovery: 47" (120 cm); Capacity: mono 32/120 (0.5/120), braid 30/205 (0.28/205); Max Drag: 18 Lb. (8.15 kg); Ball Bearings: 7+1; Weight: 19 Oz. (545 g); Drag: front
* Magfin™ Counsellor™ Golden Edition - Ratio: 6.2:1; Recovery: 29.5" (75 cm); Capacity: mono 12/120 ( 0.3/120), braid 20/160 (0.23/160); Max Drag: 23 Lb. (10.5 kg); Ball Bearings: 10+1; Weight: 9.2 Oz. (260 g); Brake: magnet & centrifugal
* RIVERTEX™ HornetSwarm™ Deluxe Edition - Ratio: 5.0:1; Recovery: 35.5" (90 cm); Capacity: mono 32/120 (0.5/120), braid 30/205 (0.28/205); Max Drag: 24.2 Lb.(11.0 kg); Ball Bearings: 9+1; Weight: 14 Oz. (395 g); Drag: front
* Magfin™ Espira DoublePunch™ Deluxe Edition - Ratio: 4.5:1; Recovery: 27.5" (70 cm); Capacity: mono 32/110 (0.5/110), braid 30/180 (0.28/180); Max Drag: 26.4 Lb. (12 kg); Ball Bearings: 9+1; Weight: 12.5 Oz. (355 g); Drag: rear
* UL-CHUBER™ Golden Ambusher™ - Ratio: 5.0:1; Recovery: 35.4" (90 cm); Capacity: mono 32/180 (0.5/180), braid 30/320 (0.28/320); Max Drag: 49.6 Lb (22.5 kg); Ball Bearings: 11+1; Weight: 28 Oz. (800 g); Drag: front
* RIVERTEX™ Golden Thunderspin™ - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 32/110 (0.5/110), braid 30/180 (0.28/180); Max Drag: 42 Lb (19.0 kg); Ball Bearings: 12+1; Weight: 13.2 Oz. (375 g); Drag: front
* RIVERTEX™ GoldenTornado™ - Ratio: 6.5:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 32/140 (0.5/140), braid 30/250 (0.28/250); Max Drag: 61.7 Lb. (28 kg); Ball Bearings: 5+1; Weight: 12.3 Oz. (350 g); Brake: centrifugal

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length 1000 yd (1000 m):
Mono .012" (0.3 mm) - Test: 12 Lb. (5.4 kg)
Mono .018" (0.45 mm) - Test: 25 Lb. (11.3 kg)
Braid .008" (0.2 mm) - Test: 10 Lb. (4.5 kg)
Braid .0085" (0.22 mm) - Test: 17 Lb. (7.7 kg)
Braid .009" (0.23 mm) - Test: 20 Lb. (9.1 kg)
Braid .012" (0.30 mm) - Test: 41.2 lb (18.7 kg)
Fluoro .009" (0.23 mm) - Test: 8 Lb. (3.6 kg)
Fluoro .016" (0.4 mm) - Test: 20 Lb. (9.1 kg)
Fluoro .022" (0.55 mm) - Test: 35 Lb. (15.8 kg)
Fluoro .025" (0.65 mm) - Test: 44 Lb. (20 kg)
* Mono Leaders - Length: 2 yd (2 m):
.006" (0.16)- Test: 7 lb (3.15 kg)
.007" (0.18)- Test: 8.3 lb (3.8 kg)
.008" (0.2) - Test: 9.7 lb (4.4 kg)
.010" (0.25) - Test: 14.3 lb (6.5 kg)
.012" (0.3) - Test: 19.8 lb (9 kg)
.016" (0.4) - Test: 33 lb (15 kg)
.02" (0.5) - Test: 43 lb (19.5 kg)
* Bobbers: Glowing Slim Float; Glowing Pear-Shaped Float
* Hooks: #16; #14; #12; #10; #8; #4; #2; #1; #1/0; #2/0; #4/0; #7/0; #9/0
* Sinkers: 1 3/4 Oz. (50 g ); 3 1/2 Oz. (100 g); Sinker 4 1/4 Oz. (125 g); 5 1/2 Oz.(150 g); 6 Oz. (175 g); 7 Oz. (200 g)
* Open Feeders: 2 Oz. (60 g); 4 1/16 Oz. (115 g); 5 1/2 Oz. (145 g)
* Closed Feeders: 3 1/2 Oz. (100 g); 6 Oz. (180 g); 7 Oz. (200 g)
* Simple Bells: 3
* Jig Heads: 1/6 Oz. (5 g), #1/0; 1/4 Oz. (7 g), #1; 1/3 Oz. (9 g) #1/0;1/2 Oz. (14 g), #2/0; 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #3/0; 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g) #4/0; 2 Oz. (56 g) #6/0
* Nymphes 4" (10 cm) (x2)
* Crayfish 3" (7.5 cm) (x2)
* Worms: Worm 12.5 cm (5") (x2); Worm 6" (15 cm)
* Shads: Shad 2" (5 cm) (x3), Shad 3" (7 cm) (x2)
* Spinnerbaits: Spinnerbait 3/4 Oz. (21 g) #3/0 (x2)
* Bass Jigs: Bass Jig 1 Oz. (28 g), #4/0 (x2)
* Spinners: Nano Spinner 1/8 Oz. (4 g), #1 (x2); Barbless Nano Spinner 1/5 Oz. (6 g), #1/0 (x2); Bullet Spinner 6/7 Oz. (24 g), #2/0; Bullet Spinner 1 1/4 Oz (36 g), #4/0
* Spoons: Narrow Spoon 1/4 Oz. (7 g), #1/0 (x2); Single Spoon 1 Oz. (28 g), #2/0 (x2); Single Spoon 1 1/2 Oz. (42 g), #4/0 (x2); Medium Spoon 2 Oz. (56 g), #6/0 (x2)
* TopWater Lures: Popper 1/4 Oz. (7 g), #1/0 (x2); Frog-popper 5/8 Oz (18 g), #3/0 (x2); Walker 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #3/0 (x2)
* Crankbaits: Crankbait 3 ft. (1 m), #2/0; Crankbait 6 ft. (2 m), #3/0; Crankbait 12 ft (3.5 m) #2/0; #3/0; Crankbait 16 ft. (5 m), #3/0; Crankbait 23 ft (7 m) #3/0; Crankbait 30 ft. (9 m), #4/0
* Baits: Red Worms; Maggots; Caster Maggots; Bloodworms; Wax Worms; Marshmallows; Yellow Maggots; Small Minnows; Vegetables; Red Maggots; Duck Mussel Meat; Centipedes; Pinkies; Night Crawlers; Bread with Honey; Medium Cutbait; Mole Cricket Larva; Sweet; Corn; Sweet Peas; Technoplankton; Pea dough; Cockchafer; Frog; Crawfish; Large Minnows; Large Cutbait
* Groundbaits: Crimson Cold Water Golden; Active Feeder Golden; Black Roacher Golden; Universal Mixture Golden; Grand Fish Feeder Golden; Big Riverine Breamer; Golden Carp Rival Golden; Catfish Destroyer Golden
* Aromas: Molasses Caramelized Golden; Sweet Crucian Golden; Spicy Roach Golden; Spicy Worms Golden; BigBream Spicy Golden; CSL (Corn Steep Liquor) Golden
* Particles: Oilcake-Pea Golden, Hemp-Corn Golden, Pastoncino mix Golden

EQUIPMENT
* GarryScott™ Golden Angler Cap - Tackles: 2
* GarryScott™ Golden Angler Jacket - Tackles: 35; Lines: 4
* UL-CHUBER Golden Box™ - Tackles: 90; Lines: 7 Chum Components: 20
* MagFin™ Golden Rod Case - Rods: 7
* UL-CHUBER™ Golden Rod Stand - Rod Slot: 3; Stand Count: 1; Bite Alarm: Yes
* GarryScott™ FishFort XL Plus Keepnet - Max Single Fish Weight: 110 Lb. (50 kg); Total Fish Weight: 330 Lb. (150 kg); Fish-Friendly: yes

KAYAKS
* Golden Kayak™ - Specifications: Length: 10 ft 4 in (3.15 m); Width: 35 in (88.9 cm); Weight: 62 lb (35 kg); Max Speed: 6 mph (9 kmh); Passenger capacity: 1

POND PASSES (30 days):
* Lesní Víla Fishery (Czech)
* Mudwater River (Missouri)
* Emerald Lake (New York)
* Rocky Lake (Colorado)
* Neherrin River (North Carolina)
* Ghent–Terneuzen Canal (Netherlands)
* Falcon Lake (Oregon)
* Everglades (Florida)
* White Moose Lake (Alberta)
* Tiber River (Italy)
* Quanchkin Lake (Louisiana)
* Saint-Croix Lake (Michigan)
* San Joaquin Delta (California)
* Kaniq Creek (Alaska)
* Sander Baggersee Lake (Germany)
* Dnipro River (Ukraine)

FISHING LICENSES (30 days):
* Advanced Czech License
* Advanced Missouri License
* Advanced New York License
* Advanced Colorado License
* Advanced North Carolina License
* Advanced Netherlands License
* Advanced Oregon License
* Advanced Florida License
* Advanced Texas License
* Advanced Alberta License
* Advanced Italy License
* Advanced Louisiana License
* Advanced Michigan License
* Advanced California License
* Advanced Alaska License
* Advanced Germany License
* Advanced Ukraine License

Join the Golden Angler Club and INSTANTLY go to the Big League with all the possible perks and privileges the gaming experience can offer! Not only do you get all the incredible Advanced & Deluxe tackle in their Golden edition, but also the most powerful state-of-the-art exclusively Golden Angler equipment, including TEN monstrously powerful Golden Angler Edition rod and reel combos, a set of prime quality Golden Angler Edition fishing apparel and the awesome cherry-on-top Golden Kayak - a durable and speedy companion for your offshore fishing adventures! Sound good? How about FULL ACCESS to ALL North American and European WATERWAYS with 30-Day Pond Passes, complemented by all corresponding Advanced Fishing Licenses! Not to mention Credits, BaitCoins, and a MONTH of Premium!

name: Fishing Planet: Golden Angler Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Fishing Planet: Golden Angler Pack - $49.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Fishing Planet: Golden Angler Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Join the Golden Angler Club and INSTANTLY go to the Big League with all the possible perks and privileges the gaming experience can offer!
